headline: Mark Cuban Hates Trump but Loves Kid Savings Accounts — Will He Shock Everyone?
summary: Billionaire Mark Cuban has long championed the idea that kids should start saving early to secure their futures. Drawing from his own childhood in Pittsburgh, where he sold garbage bags door-to-door to fund small dreams like new basketball shoes, Cuban stresses hands-on financial lessons. In interviews, he advises parents to open savings accounts for children ... Mark Cuban Hates Trump but Loves Kid Savings Accounts — Will He Shock Everyone?

headline: David Solomon Praised Trump Accounts – Will Goldman Sachs Billions Follow?
summary: The Trump Account savings accounts created by the One Big Beautiful Bill Act in July represent a new federal push toward building generational wealth. These tax-deferred investment vehicles target newborns born between January 1, 2025, and December 31, 2028, seeding each eligible child’s account with a $1,000 government deposit. Modeled after 401(k)s and IRAs, the ... David Solomon Praised Trump Accounts – Will Goldman Sachs Billions Follow?

headline: Dell increasing prices on surging demand for memory units, Business Insider says
summary: Starting December 17, Dell Technologies (DELL) is set to hike prices across its commercial product lines, according to an internal list of upcoming price changes sent to staff on December 9 and seen by Business Insider. The list outlines price hikes for Dell’s commercial business – meaning its sales to corporate clients rather than individual consumers, Business Insider’s Polly Thompson. The commercial business accounts for about 85% of Dell’s annual revenue in the Client Solutions Group, the di
